choices: Katie 10 years old (you used to babysit her)
1.content:
After a long year of school I was excited to go home and get packing for my trip to the USA to see my old family and friends.

But unfortunately my plans changed...

As I made a quick snack before getting ready to pack my suitcase a letter slipped through the door marked Confidential Addressee only with my name on it: Percy Williamson.

Panicking I opened the letter to discover someone knew of my plan to hide my report card from mom and said they’d reveal its contents to her if you didn’t go to the park by 4:30 to discuss terms

I looked at the clock in the living room and saw it was almost quarter past 4 so you bolted out the door to go to the park to see a girl leaning against a tree you approached and said was it you that sent the letter.....
1.title: Caught in the act

choices: Shannon stops at the Parks restrooms.
Shannon stops at the Rangers station
Shannon stops at the stream in the middle of the park.
Shannon stops at the highest cliff, overlooking the river cutting through the pa
12.content:
Just as you got to the park you saw Shannon, your next door neighbor leaning against a tree smiling, “Well hello Percy! I’m so happy that you made it on time" she says looking at her watch.

"Percy, I have watched you over the last few months and I’ve seen how you drool over peoples feet, and of course of how you look at mine" she says whilst wiggling her bare toes at you .. " I don't really like using blackmail tactics on you but I have to be sure that you know who is in charge now, and just to demonstrate this I want you to kiss you feet right here and now " as Shannon looks at you in your eyes and then down to her bare feet ...

Thinking about her having the upper hand on you, you look around and see nobody else in sight, so dropping down in front of Shannon, you bend forward and plant a few kisses on both of her bare feet and then look up into Shannon's eyes, " That's very good Percy, Thank you, now follow me into the park" as you see Shannon walk deeper inside of the thick trees, not bothering to look back at you.

You quickly get up and follow Shannon deeper inside of the thick trees of the surrounding forest .
12.title: Shannon 13 years old

choices: Eat a banana off my feet
123.content:
As you follow Shannon through the park you can’t help but marvel at how amazing her soles look despite being extremely dirty.

As you continued following Shannon you begin fantasise about how much you’d love to lick her feet clean when she stopped right next to a stream grinning at you.

“I bet you want me to clean my feet is this stream don’t you” Shannon said teasingly as she settled herself next to a fallen tree.

“ now I want you to.....”

choices: Shannon has other ideas for Percy now , smiling broadly.
You do everything Shannon tells you to do .
1233.content:
"Okay now Percy, I want you to Eat a banana off my feet, but first you have to make my small feet very slick to be able to slide the banana easily between them … so lets get to work Percy "

As you see Shannon waving both her small feet at you, you then bend down and grab both beautiful small feet and dipped them into the stream to wash off the dirt and leaves before bringing your mouth down and sucking her cute small toes, which draws some soft moans from her .. " Really get the whole feet slick Percy" as you begin to fully lick up and down the soles of both her feet.

When you had her two small feet slick enough, Shannon reaches in and pulls a real banana from her pocket and positions it between her soles and tells you to slide it back and forth between them, as you do this you cannot help thinking of yourself between her soft small soles instead of the banana and it gets you hard watching it slide between them.
As you continue sliding the banana between them, Shannon sees how hard you have become and thought of a way to see if you will do whatever she tells you to do " Okay Percy now peel it back to where just the end of the banana was still in the peel of the banana', Shannon then looks at you and says " okay Percy, now I want you to eat the banana but you cannot use your teeth, you MUST SUCK the banana, nice and slow " Feeling kind of weird but wanting to make Shannon happy with you, you then open your mouth and stretch your lips over the end of the banana and sink your mouth down the length, Shannon is watching you with wide and wild eyes and coaching on " Ohh that's it Percy, your doing great baby, just open your throat and deep throat the entire banana … Oh Percy this is making me crazy, now move your head up and down the banana Percy ,,, OH YES PERCY just like that " as you are now rocking back and forth along the length of the banana …

Does Shannon do more with Percy and the banana or will she bring out something else
1233.title: Eat a banana off my feet

13.content: I was shocked to see Katie standing against the tree, when I asked her was it you that sent the letter.....she just smiled saying " Of course Percy, I have watched you for a long time when you use to baby sit me and I always saw how excited you got when I would go around barefoot, It took me a while to get it but now I know you REALLY LIKE my small feet ..... and now I want you to 'play' with them .
13.title: Katie 10 years old (you used to babysit her)

131.content:
“O-okay please don’t tell anyone Katie” I said my face red with embarrassment. Katie grinned because she knew she had me right where she wanted me.

Katie was wearing pink flip flops and had painted her toenails red because she maybe remembered I preferred them that way when she said “that’s right Percy stare at my feet their all your going to see for a while”

Katie then instructed me to follow her to her house and I was to stare at her feet whilst smelling a pair of black sweaty gym socks she’d just brought out of her pocket.

As we arrived at Katie’s house and made our way upstairs Katie told me she wanted me to.....
131.title: I asked her what she wanted me to do .

1311.content:
“Sniff my feet foot boy” Kate said grinning as she placed her feet in my lap and told me she wanted to hear deep sniffs and she might just reward me.

My eyes widened at the thought of that and grabbed Katie’s left foot and practically inhaled her foot scent which was heavenly....

I moved my nose all over her feet from the heel to her sweet smelling toes and it was all I could do to resist kissing her feet.

After ten minutes sniffing Katie’s heavenly foot scent she told me I’d just about done enough for a reward and she grinned as she told me the choices....
1311.title: Smell her feet

1312.content:
As we walk into Katies room, she sits down on her bed and motions for me to kneel down in front of her, as she lifts up a small foot and places it against my lips, " Okay Percy, suck and lick my toes now, and if you do a good job with them and make me feel real good, I might just let you do more than just lick and kiss and suck on them" as she stared at my bulging shorts.

I imagined rubbing myself against her soft small feet, in between them and watching her expression, until I covered her small feet and then would await her next instructions...

I snapped out of my daydream and crossed my fingers that it would turn out that way.
1312.title: Worship her feet

Katie couldn't bring herself to say anything specific .

She looked at me and said " I want you to do whatever you wanted " and then she closed her eyes and layed her head back .

1312321.content: No. Here’s how things will work: I know your parents are going on a business trip out of town soon and I am going to be left in charge. You probably thought you could control me through that time and make me do whatever you want, but no. I am in charge and you shall do WHATEVER I want you to do. You are in luck, as I do like your small little toes, but you are no longer in charge and you shall do my bidding. Your parents are going to leave soon for a night out and you will be left here for me to watch. You shall do everything I ask and if you don’t, I will report everything you have done wrong to your parents and you will be in big trouble. Am I understood?” She timidly rises, and after seeing your anger she softly says “Yes.... I do”. You look at the clock. Seeing that it is nearly time for her parents to leave, you say “Okay, your parents are leaving, so let’s go over some rules for you. I think you remember vividly that you like playing puppy, and be taken around the house like one. Well, you are lucky, as you shall be my little puppy girl, and you will be my property.” “But...But” “No ‘buts’ here. You will call me ‘sir’ and you be sure to do so, or there will be consequences.” From downstairs you hear her mother say “We’re leaving. Thanks for agreeing to take care of her!” As you respond appropriately, you notice that your pet is on her knees waiting for orders. You decide that she may as well get busy and command her to...
